thread.title: Win a return business class flight to New York
thread.title_full: Win a return business class flight to New York

title: Win a return business class flight to New York
text:
Win a return business class flight to New York 3 August 2015 Next 
La Compagnie is offering a London-New York return business class ticket 
Stylish new all-business-class airline La Compagnie offers incredibly low fares between London and New York (Paris and New York, too). Itâ€™s the smartest way to cross the Atlantic and more than 25,000 passengers have already enjoyed this premium business-class service without the business-class price tag. 
La Compagnie takes off from London Luton airport, avoiding the hassle of the larger London airports. Passengers enjoy fast-track security status, awaiting their flights in the La Compagnie lounge. Arriving at Newark Liberty Airport, Manhattan, is just a short taxi or train ride away. 
Inside each La Compagnie cabin, just 74 generously proportioned lie-flat beds welcome passengers. The highly trained crew offers practically personalised attention, handing out amenity kit treats from cult French beauty brand Caudalie. Seasonally inspired dishes created by renowned French chef Christophe Langree are served, along with handpicked wines and champagne. 
There is no better way to travel to the Big Apple, so try to win that free ticket by answering the question below. 
Q How many seats are there in total onboard each La Compagnie plane? 
Email your answer along with your name, agency and phone number to competitions@ttgdigital.com 
For more on La Compagnie visit www.lacompagnie.com . For trade enquiries please email aiden.walsh@lacompagnie.com 
Closing date: September 18, 2015
